mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_SIZE, EVENT_KATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_SIZE, EVENT_KATE FROM TB_EVENT WHERE EVENT_KATE = 'N')

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_SIZE, EVENT_KATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_SIZE, EVENT_KATE FROM TB_EVENT WHERE EVENT_KATE = 'Y')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EVENT( EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_IMG, EVENT_THUMB, EVENT_SIZE ) VALUES( TB_EVENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{EVENT_TITLE}, #{EVENT_CONTENT}, #{EVENT_IMG}, #{EVENT_THUMB}, #{EVENT_SIZE} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_EVENT SET EVENT_KATE = #{EVENT_KATE}, EVENT_TITLE = #{EVENT_TITLE}, EVENT_CONTENT = #{EVENT_CONTENT}, EVENT_IMG = #{EVENT_IMG}, EVENT_THUMB = #{EVENT_THUMB}, EVENT_SIZE = #{EVENT_SIZE} WHERE EVENT_INDEX = #{EVENT_INDEX}
